attributes.action: c, current President of the United States of America, delared a War Criminal, and Enemy of the State
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime minister Gordon Brown to have George bush be declared as a war criminal, due to his flagrant disregard for human life, with unjust wars in afghanistan and iraq, just to get oil, not to remove terrorism. we further petition the prime minister to labelled george bush as an enemy to the united kingdom and the Republic of Ireland, and to be treated as such

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
